DOC.brief_summary: To study impact Individual Placement Support ( IPS ) support employment ( SE ) compare treatment-as-usual vocational rehabilitation program ( VRP ) veterans posttraumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Vocational Rehabilitation Mentally III Veterans
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : study impact Individual Placement Support ( IPS ) support employment ( SE ) compare treatment-as-usual vocational rehabilitation program ( VRP ) veterans posttraumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) . Research Design : This prospective randomized study evaluate impact IPS-SE compare VRP occupational , sobriety , psychiatric , quality life outcomes health care cost veterans chronic PTSD enter Tuscaloosa VA Medical Center 's ( TVAMC ) vocational rehabilitation program . Methodology : Occupational functioning determine primarily whether veteran obtain maintain competitive employment , , secondarily , time work wage earn employed . Veterans meet inclusion criterion randomize either IPS-SE VRP . Outcomes assess fix 12-month observation period ( begin randomization compute entire 12-month observation period ) percent subject employ least one week ( employed rate ) , monthly employment rate ( maintain employ rate ) . In addition , PTSD symptoms health-related quality life measure evaluate . This strategy use available data 1-year period .
DOC.criteria: Male Female Age , great equal 19 less 61 . Enrollment TVAMC VRP Signed informed consent Chronic posttraumatic stress disorder Any race ethnic origin Anticipation remain catchment area 12month study duration Lifetime history severe traumatic brain injury result severe cognitive impairment History schizophrenia , schizoaffective , disorder , bipolar I disorder Pending litigation In need immediate detoxification .
